name: Proposed_Resolution_20-1009.pdf
text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-1009 (Deemed Approved November 8, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4747

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
September 23,
2014

To confirm the appointment of Mr. Keith Jones to the Board of Industrial Trades.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Industrial Trades Keith Jones Confirmation Resolution
of 2014".
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the appointment of:
Keith Jones
2122 14th Street, S.E.
Washington, D.C. 20020
(Ward 8)
as a licensed steam and other operating engineer member of the Board of Industrial Trades,
established by section 1002(d) of the Second Omnibus Regulatory Reform Amendment Act of
1998, effective April 20, 1999 (D.C. Law 12-261; D.C. Official Code § 47-2853.06(d)), and
pursuant to section 2 of the Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2-142;
D. C. Official Code § 1-523.01), replacing Michael Wayne Hogue, for a term to end June 26,
2015.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Board of
Industrial
Trades Keith
Jones
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
title: Board of Industrial Trades Keith Jones Confirmation Resolution of 2014
